record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--H.R. 2366

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that H.R. 2366 has been received from the House and is at the desk. I ask for its first reading.

record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask for its second reading and object to my own request.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be read for the second time on the next legislative day.
